apis.name: Snippet visibility level
apis.description: Constants for snippet visibility levels are:

attributes.name: private
attributes.type: The snippet is visible only to project members

attributes.name: internal
attributes.type: The snippet is visible for any logged in user except external users

attributes.name: public
attributes.type: The snippet can be accessed without any authentication

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.description: The ID of a project’s snippet
